code: public int factorial(int num) {  //Complete     return (num == 0 || num == 1) ? 1 : num * factorial(num - 1);}
public String reverseString(String input){if (input == null || input.isEmpty()) {return input;} StringBuilder reversed = new StringBuilder(input).reverse();   return reversed.toString();}
